mapper.select: SELECT cp.cart_item_id AS cartitemid, p.PDTTHUM, p.PDTNAME , p.PDTPRICE, cp.quantity, cp.picksize, p.pdtid FROM cart_pdt cp Left OUTER JOIN product P ON cp.pdtid = p.pdtid order by cp.cart_item_id desc
mapper.update: update cart_pdt set quantity = #{quantity} where cart_item_id = #{cartItemId}
